name: Death is Just the Beginning - a WASP's Life
name_original: Death is Just the Beginning - a WASP's Life
description: This game was created for the GameDev.TV, Game Jam 2022.  The game was made within 10 - days.  The theme of the GameJam was,  "Death is Only the Beginning."  I didn't want to make a zombie killer game so I applied the theme to the life of a wasp.  Hope you like it!
